an10.36:4.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti?
an10.36:4.2: “Dasahi kho, upāli, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
an10.36:4.8: pātimokkhaṃ kho panassa vitthārena svāgataṃ hoti suvibhattaṃ suppavattaṃ suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanaso;
an10.36:4.9: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā;
an10.36:4.10: paṭibalo hoti anabhiratiṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā;
an10.36:4.11: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ;
an10.36:4.12: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ;
an10.36:4.16: Imehi kho, upāli, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
